entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander is mentioned as someone who told Harry about the secret workings of wands.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and has a walnut wand.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who had not won the allegiance of her wand.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is mentioned as someone from whom Hermione took the walnut wand.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: Griphook is a goblin who enters the bedroom and notices Harry's sword.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as someone to whom Harry and Hermione told about their departure.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as someone to whom Harry and Hermione told about their departure.

relationships.description: Ollivander had told Harry about the secret workings of wands.
Hermione took her wand from Bellatrix.
Harry's sword was noticed by Griphook.
Harry and Hermione told Bill about their departure.
Harry and Hermione told Fleur about their departure.
